name: Senior Software Engineer in Test, iTero (Python)
description:
We’re looking for Senior Software Engineer in Test (Senior SDET) who will join our team and will take part in creation of world-known software products in iTero scanning business.

iTero ® intraoral scanners are designed to deliver speed, reliability, intuitive operations, and outstanding visualization capabilities for general practitioners or orthodontists. iTero scans have been used in more than 1.2 million restorative crowns, bridges, and custom implant abutment cases and more than 1.3 million iTero orthodontic scans.

Successful candidate will expand auto testing coverage for Scanner applications using Python-based testing automation framework in strong collaboration with Israel R&D Center.

In this role, you will…

  • Develop new and support existing auto testing scripts (auto tests code refactoring)
  • Configure and run auto tests, analyze auto testing execution reports
  • Create bug reports according to auto tests execution results, track fixes for these defects
  • Testing Automation infrastructure support
  • Testing Automation frameworks constant improvement
  • Provide knowledge transfers to other teams on Testing Automation infrastructure, tools and solutions
  • Participate in project releases delivery (on demand)

In this role, you’ll need …

Essential:

  • At least 3 years of experience in Testing Automation
  • Strong Python expert
  • Experience of working with pytest and pywinauto
  • Experience of working with Git/BitBucket
  • Experience of working with Jenkins
  • Fluent English (written and spoken)

Nice to have:

  • Experience in any of the following tools: protobuf, attrs, allure, assertpy, sqlalchemy, ealsticsearch-dsl, inject, bottle, Flask
  • Experience in Rest API testing
  • Basic knowledge of Selenium Web driver
  • Experience of working with Bamboo (or other CI tools), JIRA, TM4J, Confluence
  • Experience of working with Agile\Kanban methodologies

We offer:

  • Employment according to the Labor law
  • Competitive salary and annual bonuses
  • Professional development and career growth, trainings, conferences, English and Spain classes
  • Voluntary Medical Insurance for all employees and their children (with dental treatment)
  • Lunch allowance
  • 31 vacation days, paid days-off.
  • Gym in the office
  • Corporate events for employees and their children
  • Flexible working hours
